title: DIY Electronics Repair
description: Learn how to troubleshoot and fix common electronic devices—from TVs and radios to mobile gadgets—through practical, hands-on techniques in a safe and accessible way.

videos.title: መሠረታዊ ኤሌክትሮኒክስ ጥገና ክፍል 1 (Basic Electronics Repair Part 1)
መሠረታዊ ኤሌክትሮኒክስ ጥገና ክፍል 2 (Basic Electronics Repair Part 2)
ኤሌክትሮኒክስ እቃዎች መለያየት እና ጥገና (Identifying and Repairing Electronics Components)
